verses.roman:
tabe govinda bahirvāsa tāṅra upare diyā
bhitara-ghare gelā mahāprabhure laṅghiyā

synonyms: tabe—then; govinda—Govinda; bahirvāsa—outward wrapper; tāṅra upare—over Him; diyā—spreading; bhitara-ghare—within the room; gelā—went; mahāprabhure laṅghiyā—crossing Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Then Govinda spread the Lord's wrapper over the Lord's body and in this way entered the room by crossing over Him.
